extendedInfo.description: IMPORTANT: Everything in PGM is customizable.  Classes, feats, stats, etc. IF Stat modifiers don't match your campaign, then CHANGE IT *before* leaving comments, saying "it doesn't work"!!  IF YOU ARE HAVING PROBLEMS, EMAIL US AND WE CAN TROUBLESHOOT IT TOGETHER!  We can't fix problems from error reports alone.  We can't fix problems from comments like "I want it to work . It seems like a good app".  BUT we CAN fix most problems that are emailed to us.**This is a DEMO and not meant to be full featured. Screen shots are of the full version. Please try this out before buying.   This DEMO allows 1 character Sheet and 1 adventure section.****Check out FAQs on our website for common problems and fixes**Pocket Game Master (PGM) is a full featured android app tailored to Game Masters and players of almost any role-playing game. This DEMO will give you a good feel for the features.  Please keep in mind that PGM was made to fit most role-playing systems. It is very powerful. However, it's up to you to change settings to match your campaign.While fully functional for players, Pocket Game Master really shines in the hands of the Game Master. PGM allows the game master to not only create a complete adventure right from their device, but to run that adventure from the device as well!  Of course, players can use this for their character sheets, map dungeons, jot down dungeon notes, and use the dice. Best of all you can network between devices and interact in real time through Wifi or Bluetooth!!Features ONLY in full version include:*Skill points*Gender, Race and Alignment*4 damage fields per character (2 in DEMO)*Temporary Attribute bonuses (ie. if you take a potion of strength, you can add 2 to your strength and easily take it off later) *Save campaigns and reload last campaign file.Finally, be considerate with your ratings as this DEMO is only here to help users.tags: rpg dungeon d&d pathfinder c&c d20 character sheet roleplaying pen paper map

reviews.title: Real Potential
reviews.comment: Please give this some love for better tablet support or create a tablet version.  A 5 star product for sure once better tablet support arrives.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Looks useful.
reviews.comment: First ran across the paid version and decided to try the tfree one as the developer recommends.  This app looks very useful as I played around with it on my Galaxy S4. The only issue I have is that this app seems designed for use on a tablet. Everything was squished together and hard to use. No fault to the development team just some thing to keep in mind.
reviews.author: Jonathan Snyder

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Best free app for what it is.
reviews.author: Barry Schultz

reviews.title: Seems okay
reviews.comment: More complicated than it needs to be. What game are those stat modifiers for? They are also coded fairly oddly, not following logic. The rest is alright, but has some issues like condition is always bad, with no option for \"none\". If it was for just one game I would give it a higher rating, or if there was an option to download settings for an individual game.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app but...
reviews.comment: The display on my Acer Iconia Tab A700 tablet is so ugly. And the dungeon map is corrupt.  With a proper tablet support, this app would be a buy.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Ok
reviews.comment: I like it but the font is too small and i can\'t read some text
reviews.author: Monda Mieo

reviews.title: Impressive
reviews.comment: A little rough around the edges but gets it done. Instead of righting in items add a slot to put name then discription. Add weapon, armor, and magic item spot
reviews.author: Jeremy L

reviews.title: No
reviews.comment: Text to small
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great product but..
reviews.comment: I need more in the way of classes and pretige classes. I actually really liked te 3 dallah one but i need to be able to incorporate existing characters the best i am able. Ill keep checking tis out if youkeep updating it.  quality product
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Changing rating.
reviews.comment: Like I promised, if I bought it I\'d raise my score from 4 to 5. Absolutely fabulous.  Completely customizable.   Noticed someone wrote about pathfinder.   I love pathfinder and YES it does work perfectly with it. BUT like the dev says YOU have to customize it yourself.  The attribute mods (bonuses) are made by changing a formula in the Campaign tab.  It does require a little work.  I am surprised some uses haven\'t figured this out.  Anyway, thought I would add my 2 cents.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: A for effort ...
reviews.comment: Pros:  Customizable content, including some rules adjustments  Network connectivity between multiple pgm clients  Cons:  Forced portrait orientation  Demo functionality isn\'t enough to showcase the great selling points of this app  Summary:  While there are some awesome features, the UI is clunky and in the demo simply doesn\'t work as advertized. I know it\'s a demo, but when changing the attributes bonus formulae doesn\'t work in the demo, why should I expect it to work in the full product?  I hope pgm 2.0 spruces things up a bit. And please remember that demo functionality is a must if you want skeptics like myself to buy the full version.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Looks promising, but..
reviews.comment: Using on a tablet with keyboard is impossible with forced portrait orientation.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Does a lot
reviews.comment: If I had a little money to spend, this would be a GREAT buy.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Neat Idea
reviews.comment: Only problem is the undo for maps. And I would add a coin flip to the dice since there\'s an empty space anyways:-)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Freakn awesome!
reviews.comment: Thanks for bailing me out again!  Joshua,  stats can be whatever you want.  You just change the formula in campaign tab.  Write developer, they are great help!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: It works ! Good app a little difficult to use but very good and useful .
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fun but innacurate
reviews.comment: Been checking out this app for a week or so and I just can\'t get past how inaccurate the stat generator is.  The stat modifiers are off quite a bit ( showing an 18 as a +3 for example).  If this were fixed, I would gladly give a higher rating and buy the full version.  Thanks
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: A promising demo!
reviews.comment: The wheels are turning in my head on how to make characters and a campaign. That is a good thing. I could seriously use this to give my players hell -- with less hassle.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very nice
reviews.comment: Great so far and tonnes more potential still to be had. Dungeon creation is a bit finicky on a XOOM regarding touching the right spots, but still very cool. Landscape option, as mentioned, would be a great addition.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: This is great.
reviews.comment: If the full version is anything like this, im in.
reviews.author: A Google User
